attributes.action: ban all MPs and Prime Ministers from ever acepting future positions working for the EU, or working where remuniration is paid by the EU.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This will ensure that decisions made, or voted on, are in the best interests of the British people, There is a clear conflict of interest on all matters relating to the EU, when highly paid work can be offered to ex members of parliament. As a example, there would be a clear temptation to vote on matters in the EUs favour if a £300k pa job has been offered by the EU when an MP loses thier seat.
